import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react'; const AddSubscriptionForm = ({onFormSubmit}) => { const [newspaperName, setNewspaperName] = useState(''); const [subscriberEmail, setSubscriberEmail] = useState(''); const [subscriptionType, setSubscriptionType] = useState('One week'); return (
setNewspaperName(e.target.value)} />
setSubscriberEmail(e.target.value)} />

{calculatePrice()}$

) } export default AddSubscriptionForm
